output.sentences: In our meeting we had the pleasure of observing our new female associate.
The speaker had very original ideas and pulled them together well.
I was impressed by the way she operated powerpoint with finesse.
She was asked many questions and answered them like a pro.
Her presentation was so interesting that everyone looked to the front of the room.
